ribbon.title: A secure and user-friendly digital currency.

intro.h2: Verge provides the security of blockchain based payments to everyday users with easy to use software tailored to real life needs and applications.
intro.p: We strive to make blockchain payments effortless and convenient.

benefit_1.title: EVERYDAY USE
benefit_1.text: Verge provides an easy to use platform which enables everyday users to be able to transact quickly and efficiently across a blockchain based network.

benefit_2.title: COMMUNITY DRIVEN
benefit_2.text: Verge is an open source project with an active team of developers from all over the world. The development team is always in close contact with the community. Verge is not a private company funded through an ICO or premining.

benefit_3.title: MASS ADOPTION
benefit_3.text: Low fees, quick transactions, high volume in circulation, multiplatform support, Wraith Protocol are the ingredients that make Verge perfectly positioned for mass adoption.

mission.text2: With Verge, businesses and individuals have flexible options for sending and receiving payments securely and efficiently all around the world in a matter of seconds.
